jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
As a Corporate Recruiter you will network both online and offline with potential candidates to attract the best professionals to join Gojek:

You will be:
• Responsible for the entire recruitment process from headhunting candidates, conducting interviews and offer 
   negotiation
• A trusted Talent Acquisition Advisor and establish a consultative relationship with Stakeholders in addressing key     
   recruitment challenges, develop and prioritize recruiting and sourcing strategies
• Responsible to build robust talent pipelines through headhunting and networking across Asia and eventually global 
   markets to tap into targeted universities, companies and technical communities.
• Responsible for influencing Stakeholders on processes, interview best practices and decision-making
• Required to provide outstanding candidate experience whilst promoting the Gojek’s brand and image
• Required to update recruiting activities in a timely manner and ensure data integrity
• Required to ensure processes are compliant with all local rules and regulations related to hiring and recruiting

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent work experience
  • Minimum 5 years of end to end recruiting experience
  • Individuals with regional recruiting experience is preferred
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills
  • Works with a high sense of urgency
  • Ability to work independently and actively within a team environment
  • Handle confidential information in a professional manner
